name: project-management-app
description: * Includes authentication and user management * Performs GET/POST/PUT/DELETE against the backend API * All exposed features should work 100% * Should be a combination of static and dynamically generated Markup. * Should incorporate animation * Code should show a good level of organization (ESmodules, classes, etc) * Code should be error free (according to team ESLint rules)
author: Joe Hawkins
